page.title: 18Troston Heath.
page.content: On our walk on Troston Heath today we saw a barley field on the corner. The first wood we saw was a little mixed wood, then we saw another barley field, then we saw another little wood with hawthorn bushes in. In the next field there was sugar beet. Then we saw a pig unit and we saw another field of sugar beet. Then we saw a deciduous wood and some cultivated grass. On the way back we saw another little wood. Then we saw a sugar beet field. Then we saw a barley field and a sweet corn field. Pine trees and poplar trees sheltered the sweet corn. Then we saw a sugar beet field. Then last of all we saw a corn field.
